p: XRD data showed that NCO samples contained a spinel Ni xCo (1−x)O 2-phase with a cubic structure Fm-3m. With increased Ni content of the Ni xCo 1−xO phase, the unit cell parameter decreased from 4.244 to 4.161 Å. XRR data show that all samples consisted of a layer uniform in density with a roughness of 0.63 to 3.23 nm. With decreasing Ni content, the film density decreased from 6.60 to 6.31 g/cm 3.
